team.name: Remote Bob
team.bioHtml: All our remote assistants have a college degree and minimum 2 years of experience in supporting UK companies and individuals remotely.

jobs.title: Co-founder (Sales Executive B2B) at Remote Bob
jobs.description:
**Who are we**
We are one of the first EU platforms for enabling business owners to find the best remote talents in admin and marketing. Employees appreciate flexibility, while business owners care most about getting work done. Those are just some of the reasons why flexible teams and remote professionals are the next big thing in the business world. Since lock-down started, more than 95% of entrepreneurs in the UK are managing and hiring remote, flexible staff. 
As we are growing exponentially, we are searching for a Senior Sales Executive with a great business network in London who knows how to generate leads and convert clients. 

**About you**
You are a problem solver, you know how to get the work done. You have unconventional ideas and can come up with original, different ways of doing things and getting noticed. If you are an ambitious, independent, driven and resourceful individual with experience in sales and lead generation, tired of the corporate environment get in touch!

Please note that this is an equity-based role.
